text: Miss Susan looked at her pityingly and said, "If you please, sir," replied the envoy. #Twitter

passages.fragment: Miss Susan looked at her pityingly and said , ``
passages.full_quote: <used>Miss Susan looked at her pityingly and said, "Y</used>ou never know what's going to happen in thirty seconds?"
The servant drew back <used>and said, "If you</used> wish to go alone, sir, I will go and tell my mistress."
and she replied with a slight primn<used>ess, "If you please</used>."
"<used>If you please, sir," sa</used>id Joyce, "if I see anyone, am I to fire?"
"At what time <used>you please, sir," replied</used> Franz
"Go on, go on, <used>sir," replied the</used> king; "you have today earned the right to make inquiries here."
"I know you do not like to converse in our langua<used>ge," replied the envoy</used>
